channel.title: Runecrafting Platebody
channel.description:
OK , this is my first platebody so please post constructive criticism instead of hatefulness Credits: 10/jagex 40/amy_webb for showing me how to make a platebody 50/me Pictures
[IMG]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l634/lulatundead/Platebody4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1127.photobucket.com/albums/l634/lulatundead/Platebody3.jpg[/img]

item.title: Runecrafting Platebody
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Death Infinity Death
item.description:
@Infinity_Death wrote:

[quote=“orcashark, post:21, topic:397128”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=494280.msg3613399#msg3613399 date=1306787376]
It looks like a clusterfuck right around where the sleeves connect to the torso.
[/quote]

I think thats just because he has the spikes there, and them going over the shoulder view from a frontside approach makes it look like a clusterfuck.[/quote]
Yeah, i extruded one of the faces and joined their joints and used knife tool to cut in half then made it into a curved spike

Read full topic

item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

It looks like a clusterfuck right around where the sleeves connect to the torso.

I think thats just because he has the spikes there, and them going over the shoulder view from a frontside approach makes it look like a clusterfuck.

item.title: Runecrafting Platebody
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Death Infinity Death
item.description:
@Infinity_Death wrote:

Nah, I’m gonna make a whole set when the contest comes out but I’m currently working on a new god armor, but I’m modeling over a 508 now so it’s not really working out to well…

item.title: Runecrafting Platebody
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:15, topic:397128”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=494280.msg3613699#msg3613699 date=1306802597]

[quote author=reyx7 link=topic=494280.msg3613406#msg3613406 date=1306787811]
Looks more like a sweater
[/quote]^ Thought the same thing, looks wooly xD
[/quote]Kinda, but when you look at it closer, it almost looks like Under Armor. Don’t it?

Ignore the pants rofl.[/quote]I want to see the pants version now…

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting Platebody
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Looks like a jagged vagina.

IMO, Skill armors have been thought of already. Not very original. A well made model but the concept is bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting Platebody
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:13, topic:397128”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=494280.msg3614174#msg3614174 date=1306836865]
Thats… a shirt.
[/quote]
Like I said; “it looks better when it’s not on the character”.[/quote]
asdgasldfjkhasdlkjfh
If I see one more semicolon I’m going to go crazy. A comma would of worked just fine right there, e.g., I said; “This is a great idea”, is incorrect. You should of just used a comma even though you are referring to what you have said. Semicolons are to link incomplete thoughts… Sorry for going off-topic, just a pet peeve of mine.

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting Platebody
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Thats… a shirt.

Like I said; “it looks better when it’s not on the character”.

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting Platebody
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Death Infinity Death
item.description:
@Infinity_Death wrote:

[quote=“man_killerx, post:10, topic:397128”][quote author=poopler40 link=topic=494280.msg3613722#msg3613722 date=1306803793]
its just a 508 male torso colored white and he added the runecrafting symbol to it and those whatever they are to the shoulders
[/quote]
The wireframe is too messy to be a JaGeX model. Maybe a prim trace.[/quote]
No , i used a cylinder and a 614 male knifed the cylinder in the parts in gets smaller or bigger on the character and re sized it to fit perfectly and poopler why would i use a 508 male???

Read full topic

its just a 508 male torso colored white and he added the runecrafting symbol to it and those whatever they are to the shoulders

item.title: Runecrafting Platebody
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Good for the first try, try some more colours and other details. Make the tail end of it stick out so it doesn’t look too much like a jumper, other then that its good. Good job, keep up the good work.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

It looks better when it’s not on the character, and I think it needs a little more work and detail as said above, other than that mate, this isn’t that bad.

item.title: Runecrafting Platebody
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Great design, but I don’t like that its so small (fits the character perfectly). Put more detail into it, it will look better

Other than that great.
